title: Crypto Order Book
description: Cypto Order book is a list containing realtime updates of  buy and sell orders of a currency pair.

title: GDG DevFest PHC
description: DevFests are community-led developer events hosted by Google Developer Groups around the globe. GDGs are focused on community building and learning.

title: Play Lyrics
description: A lyric trivia game that allows a user to guess a particular song title based on the snippet displayed.

title: Senate Directory
description: Senate Directory is a progressive web application that displays the names, senatorial districts and contact details of the Nigerian Senate.
